== Introduction ==

Hello, welcome to the page of Monia Spinelli! <<BR>>
I'm passionate of Open Source. I know Ubuntu since 2006 and now I use it at home and at work.
In my opinion Ubuntu is the best way to use a PC.
<<BR>>
From a few month I'm contributing to Ubuntu in a various ways. First I joined the Italian Community and now I'm involved in testing and promotions.<<BR>>
I'm also a member of Ubuntu Women and Printing groups.<<BR>>
Ubuntu is a great chance to spread FLOSS over the world.
